# NSTextBlock.Dimension

**Enumeration**

The following constants specify values used by the methods [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextBlock/setValue(_:type:for:)], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextBlock/value(for:)], and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextBlock/valueType(for:)] to specify text block dimensions.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Dimension
```

## Constants

- **NSTextBlock.Dimension.width**: Width of the text block.
- **NSTextBlock.Dimension.minimumWidth**: Minimum width of the text block.
- **NSTextBlock.Dimension.maximumWidth**: Maximum width of the text block.
- **NSTextBlock.Dimension.height**: Height of the text block.
- **NSTextBlock.Dimension.minimumHeight**: Minimum height of the text block.
- **NSTextBlock.Dimension.maximumHeight**: Maximum height of the text block.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Working with dimensions of content

- **setValue(_:type:for:)**: Sets a dimension of the text block.
- **value(for:)**: Returns the value of the specified text block dimension.
- **valueType(for:)**: Returns the value type of the specified text block dimension.
- **setContentWidth(_:type:)**: Sets the width of the text block.
- **contentWidth**: The width of the text block.
- **contentWidthValueType**: The type of value stored for the text block width.
- **NSTextBlock.ValueType**: The following constants specify values used by the methods [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextBlock/setValue(_:type:for:)] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextBlock/valueType(for:)] to specify text block value types.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
